t: In Ecuador's Amazon rainforest, solar-powered boats are a boon for the trees : Goats and Soda : NPR
s: December 2, 2023 - The Indigenous Achuar people in Ecuador's Amazon rainforest sail in six solar-powered canoes. And it's not just to save money on fuel — the trees of the rainforest will benefit too.
